basic.Peptide Name: Human TC-1 (Chain of Platelet basic protein; Human, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MBC=0.4 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MBC=6.8 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MBC=3.4 µM).Fungi:Cryptococcus neoformans (MFC=1.9 µM).
